document.full_text: the vancouver canucks took advantage of a frustrated san jose sharks on wednesday, pounding out a 7-3 win to take a 2-0 series lead in the nhl's western conference finals.
document.title: vancouver slam san jose 7-3 in playoff win
lines_and_colors: the vancouver canucks took advantage of a frustrated san jose sharks on wednesday, pounding out a 7-3 win to take a 2-0 series lead in the nhl's western conference finals.
